name: Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & The Secret Fairy - Premium Box
summary: This edition includes the following PS4 Game: Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & The Secret Fairy, Ryza costume downloadable content: "Dawn Sonnet", Tao’s Notebook (visual book), B2 cloth poster featuring special illustration, Clear file x 2, Acrylic mini character charm
